Button.new.name: Button.new(x, y, text, callback [, disabled [, visible]])

Button.setDisabled.name: Button.setDisabled(disabled)
Button.setDisabled.summary: Sets whether or not the button is disabled.

Button.setFocused.name: Button.setFocused(focused)
Button.setFocused.summary: Sets whether or not the button is focused.

Button.setText.name: Button.setText(text)
Button.setText.summary: Sets the text of a button.

Button.setVisible.name: Button.setVisible(visible)
Button.setVisible.summary: Sets whether or not the button is visible.

EventManager.name: EventManager
EventManager.summary: A basic event manager, allows for adding multiple listeners to an event.

EventManager.addListener.name: EventManager.addListener(listener, callback)
EventManager.addListener.summary: Adds a listener to the event manager.

FileUtils.name: FileUtils
FileUtils.summary: File utilities for saving and reading files

FileUtils.read.name: FileUtils.read(path)
FileUtils.read.summary: Reads a file and its contents.

FileUtils.readJSON.name: FileUtils.readJSON(path)
FileUtils.readJSON.summary: Reads the JSON content of a file.

FileUtils.write.name: FileUtils.write(path, content)
FileUtils.write.summary: Writes to a file with the specified content.

FileUtils.writeJSON.name: FileUtils.writeJSON(path, content)
FileUtils.writeJSON.summary: Writes the specified content to a file as JSON.

FocusableEventManager.name: FocusableEventManager
FocusableEventManager.summary: An event manager to be used with inputs and buttons.

FocusableEventManager.addButton.name: FocusableEventManager.addButton(button)
FocusableEventManager.addButton.summary: Adds a button to the event manager.

FocusableEventManager.addInput.name: FocusableEventManager.addInput(input)
FocusableEventManager.addInput.summary: Adds an input to the event manager.

FocusableEventManager.inject.name: FocusableEventManager.inject(manager)
FocusableEventManager.inject.summary: Injects the event manager into the event manager.

Input.fire.name: Input.fire(e)
Input.fire.summary: Fires events (key & char) to an input

Input.new.name: Input.new(x, y, onChange, onComplete [, placeholder [, disabled [, default [, enabled]]]])

Input.setContent.name: Input.setContent(content)
Input.setContent.summary: Sets the content of the input.

Input.setDisabled.name: Input.setDisabled(disabled)
Input.setDisabled.summary: Sets whether or not the input is disabled.

Input.setFocused.name: Input.setFocused(focused)
Input.setFocused.summary: Sets whether or not the input is focused.

Input.setPlaceholder.name: Input.setPlaceholder(focused)
Input.setPlaceholder.summary: Sets the placeholder for the input.

Input.setVisible.name: Input.setVisible(visible)
Input.setVisible.summary: Sets whether or not the input is visible.

Logger.name: Logger
Logger.summary: A logger good enough for ComputerCraft.

Logger.critical.name: Logger.critical(message, ...)
Logger.critical.summary: Logs a message as a Critcal Error.

Logger.debug.name: Logger.debug(message, ...)
Logger.debug.summary: Logs a message as a Debug message.

Logger.error.name: Logger.error(message, ...)
Logger.error.summary: Logs a message as an Error.

Logger.info.name: Logger.info(message, ...)
Logger.info.summary: Logs a message as an Info message.

Logger.warn.name: Logger.warn(message, ...)
Logger.warn.summary: Logs a message as a Warning.

ProcessOptions.name: ProcessOptions
ProcessOptions.summary: A table containing options to start a process.

Registry.readKey.name: Registry.readKey(from, key, isRaw)
Registry.readKey.summary: Reads a key from a registry file.

Registry.update.name: Registry.update(from, to)
Registry.update.summary: Upgrades an old registry to a new one.

Registry.writeKey.name: Registry.writeKey(from, key, data)
Registry.writeKey.summary: Reads a key from a registry file.

Scrollbox.name: Scrollbox
Scrollbox.summary: A fancy scrollbox creater that have scrollbars and scrolling boxes.

Scrollbox.addToEventManager.name: Scrollbox.addToEventManager(em)
Scrollbox.addToEventManager.summary: Adds events to the specified EventManager.

Scrollbox.ensureScroll.name: Scrollbox.ensureScroll(d)
Scrollbox.ensureScroll.summary: Scrolls the specified delta, and ensures it can be scrolled to.

Scrollbox.getScroll.name: Scrollbox.getScroll()
Scrollbox.getScroll.summary: Gets the scroll position of a scrollbox.

Scrollbox.new.name: Scrollbox.new(x, y, w, h, parent [, renderScrollbars])

Utils.drawBorder.name: Utils.drawBorder(x, y, w, h, color, style)

Utils.drawPixelCharacter.name: Utils.drawPixelCharacter(x, y, tl, tr, l, r, bl, br, tc, bc)

Utils.fromBlit.name: Utils.fromBlit(blit)
Utils.fromBlit.summary: Converts a blit to a color number

Utils.getPixelChar.name: Utils.getPixelChar(tl, tr, l, r, bl, br)
Utils.getPixelChar.summary: Gets a drawing character from the cells that are set to true.

Utils.selectXfromBlit.name: Utils.selectXfromBlit(x, blit)
Utils.selectXfromBlit.summary: Selects an X position from a blit string (or just any string really)

wm.name: wm
wm.summary: The window manager and it's functions.

wm.getSize.name: wm.getSize()
wm.getSize.summary: Gets the size of the window manager.

wm.killProcess.name: wm.killProcess(id)
wm.killProcess.summary: Kills a process with the specified ID.
